document_data.caption: A map showing Sharra's Flight and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sharra's Flight
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharra's Flight''' was a small back alley and courtyard that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sharra's Flight was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley branched east off of the [[Street of Whispers]] at several locations, passing through a small neighborhood and connecting with the southern side of [[Moonstar Alley]]. An entrance to the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|Waterdeep's sewers]] was also located here.
document_data.History: The alley was named for [[Sharra|Sharra of the Invisble Dragon]].
